A Portrait Of The Artist As A Young Man (Arc Classics)

by James Joyce
Arcturus Publishing

Your net price $2.99
:

Pub Date: 2018
Format: Paperback
Pages: 272
Size: 8.00(h) x 5.00(w) x 0.82(t) inches
Case Quantity: 64

ISBN: 9781788283366
TB Code: 2212180
Availability: 849 in stock

James Joyce's first novel follows the life of Stephen Dedalus, an artistic and fiercely individual young man. Along the way, Stephen learns to negotiate the 'snares of the world', to avoid the pitfalls of his dysfunctional family, his terrifying and repressive boarding school and the various beautiful young ladies who capture his heart.
